title: Integrate with AgentOS
content:
agent_os = AgentOS(
    agents=[Agent(id="basic-agent", model=OpenAIChat(id="gpt-5-mini"))],
    base_app=app
)

app = agent_os.get_app()
python  theme={null}
agent_os = AgentOS(agents=[agent])
app = agent_os.get_app()
